entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #6: Add wiki external format plugin as basis for wiki enhancements
entry.content: • Target version changed from v0.2 - Public Beta to v0.4 - Wiki Enhancements

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #6: Add wiki external format plugin as basis for wiki enhancements
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Closed

This plugin is no longer supported, and does not work in the 2.X series (current) of redmine.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #6: Add wiki external format plugin as basis for wiki enhancements
entry.content: Again, a shame.... We should be on the look out for how else we can improve wiki functionality, especially as it relates to print quality documentation.
